mapper.select: SELECT `majorName` FROM aptitude_dictionary WHERE majorUuid = #{majorUuid} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1
select t.`std_code` from biaodaa_admin.`dic_alias` t where t.`name` = #{name}
select t.`bench_name` from biaodaa_admin.`dic_qua` t where t.`qua_code` = #{qualCode} and t.`bench_name` is not null
select id from biaodaa_admin.`dic_qua_info` where name =#{name}
